name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Java Engineer with 9 years of experience in developing and maintaining scalable, reliable applications. Expert in **Core Java**, **Spring**, **Spring Boot**, and **REST API**, leveraging **Azure** for cloud solutions. Proficient in **CI/CD** processes, utilizing **Apigee**, **appDynamics**, and **Splunk** for monitoring and performance optimization. Adept at collaborating in **Agile** environments while mentoring junior engineers. Recognized for my problem-solving abilities and strong communication skills, I have successfully implemented complex solutions across various sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, resulting in significant improvements through automation and robust architecture.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Core Java**, **Spring**, and **Spring Boot** to design a microservices-based Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS), achieving **95%** accuracy in patient tracking and significantly enhancing adherence rates through automated reminders.
Developed **REST APIs** with **Spring Data JPA**, improving data accuracy by **40%** and ensuring secure EHR integration with **Spring Security** and **OAuth2**.
Enhanced UI/UX for the pathway builder using **React** and **Ant Design**, reducing completion time by **30%**.
Built a notification system with **RabbitMQ**, achieving **99%** timely alert delivery.
Established CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, reducing deployment times by **80%**.
Containerized microservices with **Docker**, streamlining deployment processes across staging and production environments.
Managed services on **AWS EKS (Kubernetes)** with **Terraform**, maintaining **99.9%** uptime and optimizing load handling with **Redis** caching.
Demonstrated strong **Agile** methodologies and fostered a collaborative environment through effective **communication** and **mentoring** of junior team members, enhancing team productivity.

• Developed robust backend services using **Core Java** and **Spring Boot**, ensuring high performance and scalability.
• Designed and implemented **REST APIs** to streamline communications and data exchanges, enhancing integration capabilities with third-party services.
• Automated CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, facilitating seamless deployments with a **50% reduction** in release time.
• Engaged in Agile methodologies to ensure timely project deliverables and effective team collaboration, leading to a **25% improvement** in project turnaround.
• Provided mentorship and guidance to junior developers, fostering a culture of knowledge sharing and continuous improvement in coding practices.
• Leveraged **appDynamics** and **Splunk** for application monitoring and performance optimization, achieving a **98% uptime** for critical applications.
• Utilized **Azure** for cloud deployments, enhancing system resilience and scalability across multiple projects.

- Developed backend **REST APIs** using **Core Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **PostgreSQL**, achieving **98%** uptime.
- Implemented the frontend with **Angular**, improving load times by **40%**.
- Led testing initiatives with **JUnit** and **Mockito**, reducing bugs by **30%**.
- Optimized frontend performance through lazy loading and code splitting, resulting in faster load times.
- Deployed solutions globally with **AWS CloudFront** and **S3** for low-latency access.
- Participated in **Agile** methodologies to enhance team communication and project delivery.
- Utilized **CI/CD** practices for streamlined application deployment and updates.
- Mentored junior developers, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and problem-solving.

skills:
Programming Languages: Core Java, Java, JavaScript (React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Vanilla JS, Node.js, TypeScript), Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin

	Backend Frameworks: Spring, Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

	Frontend Frameworks: React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

	API Technologies: REST API, Apigee

	Serverless and Cloud Functions: AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3, Lambda), API Gateway, Azure

	Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

	DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline, CI/CD

	Cloud & Infrastructure: Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

	Other: Microservices, Problem-solving, Communication, Mentoring, Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies
